words.definition: To discuss in order to reach an agreement.
words.arabic_definition: يناقش من أجل التوصل إلى اتفاق.

example.en: We will negotiate the terms of the contract.

words.definition: To convince someone to do or believe something.
words.arabic_definition: إقناع شخص بفعل شيء أو تصديق شيء.

example.en: She tried to persuade him to accept the offer.
They came to an agreement after long negotiations.
example.ar: توصلوا إلى اتفاق بعد مفاوضات طويلة.

words.definition: Accepting some demands to reach an agreement.
words.arabic_definition: قبول بعض المطالب للتوصل إلى اتفاق.

example.en: A compromise was necessary to solve the issue.

words.definition: Make someone believe or agree with an idea.
words.arabic_definition: جعل شخص ما يصدق فكرة أو يوافق عليها.

example.en: He tried to convince the client to accept the proposal.
Trust and respect are mutual in negotiations.

words.definition: To discuss prices or conditions to reach an agreement.
words.arabic_definition: مناقشة الأسعار أو الشروط للتوصل إلى اتفاق.

example.en: They started to bargain over the contract terms.

words.definition: The ability to affect a person or situation.
words.arabic_definition: القدرة على التأثير على شخص أو موقف.

example.en: He used his influence to help the team.
He offered a concession to win the deal.

words.definition: Confident and direct in expressing needs or opinions.
words.arabic_definition: واثق ومباشر في التعبير عن الاحتياجات أو الآراء.

example.en: She was assertive during the negotiation.
